title: Biden, in Midterm Campaign Pitch, Focuses on Social Security and Medicare
description: In a whirlwind tour of Florida, the president sought to paint Republicans as a threat to the two retirement programs. But his campaign swing did not go without bumps.
dc:creator: Peter Baker

media:content.media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: “They’re coming after your Social Security and Medicare, and they’re saying it out loud,” President Biden said at a rally in Miami Gardens, Fla., on Tuesday.
